thread.title: Ground News - The sunshine returns just in time for your busy weekend!
thread.title_full: Ground News - The sunshine returns just in time for your busy weekend!

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - The sunshine returns just in time for your busy weekend!
text:
Summary by Ground News Sunshine returns to end the workweek. The Valley is sitting between two areas of low pressure and with that, drier air is working into the area. T.J. Springer lets us know if the sunshine sticks around for our New Year's Weekend. The News 8 Storm Team has compiled a FAIR AMOUNT of TIDBITS over the last year. Share menu More
Filters 3 Articles 3 Articles All Left Center Right
News 4 JAX Center High Factuality Media Conglomerate: Graham Holdings The sunshine returns just in time for your busy weekend! Sunny skies return today, with breezy conditions and colder temperatures. Sunglasses and winter jackets will be needed for the Gator Bowl. Clear skies with a light freeze and frost possible overnight through early Saturday.The Gator Bowl will be breezy, sunny and chilly with kick off temperatures around 55 degrees.Hazards: Minor flooding continues along the St. Marys and Santa Fe Rivers. Sunny skies and much colder temperatures this weekend. It …
